'''Drifting Bottles of Summer Memories''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.7]].

==How to Access Event==
# Event Link:<br>[https://act.hoyolab.com/bbs/event/epiaol0820v2/index.html?hyl_presentation_style=fullscreen Go to Event >>]
# Click Tools > HoYoLAB > BottleMi

==How to Participate==
# Throw bottles: Write anything you'd like, place it in the bottle, and throw it!
# Fish out bottles: Randomly fish out and interact with drifting bottles thrown by others.

==Event Rewards==
Comment with a screenshot of your bottle or a bottle you fished out to obtain a Summer Drifting Bottle Avatar (Permanent)
